verbose_text: In thre present study, HSP22 downregulation increased p-eNOS / eNOS and decreased p-p38 MAPK expression in the HUVECs, suggesting that ATV reduced AS through suppressing HSP22 dependent inactivation of eNOS signaling and activation of p38 MAPK, which is in line with another previous study.
evidence: HSP22-dependent inactivation of eNOS signaling and activation of p38 MAPK
